meanings.definition: The branch of dentistry dealing with the study and treatment of dental pulp and tissues surrounding the roots of the teeth.
meanings.sent1: Endodontics helps dentists understand and care for the inside of teeth.
meanings.sent2: My uncle specializes in endodontics and saves many teeth from pain.
meanings.sent3: The endodontics class was so interesting that even the tooth fairy attended.
meanings.sent4: The roots of knowledge grow deep in the soil of endodontics.
meanings.sent5: Learning about endodontics is like exploring the hidden world beneath our smiles.

meanings.definition: The practice of performing root canal therapy to treat infections and diseases of the dental pulp.
meanings.sent1: Endodontics can help relieve toothaches by treating infections in the roots.
meanings.sent2: After endodontics, the patient felt much better and could eat without pain.
meanings.sent3: The dentist joked that endodontics was like giving the tooth a spa day.
meanings.sent4: In the world of dentistry, endodontics is the superhero fighting tooth villains.
meanings.sent5: The precision required in endodontics is like performing delicate surgery inside a tiny cave.
